feed.title: Invoice Ninja Releases

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.57
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Hot patch for MSAL / Crypto / HTTPS
  • v5.11.57 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10776

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.56...v5.11.57

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.58
New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.59
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for react build failing due to HTTP connections.
  • v5.11.59 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10782

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.58...v5.11.59

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.60
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Improve filtering when sorting by client name
  • Fixes for Markdown parsing
  • Bump quickbooks minor version support => 75
  • Feature: Make health checkup return string by @cnohall in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10765
  • Fixes for Profit Loss by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10783
  • Remove callbackSecret from Blockonomics payments gateway by @cnohall in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10767
  • remove parent folder in tar.gz by @benbrummer in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10772
  • v5.11.60 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10788

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.59...v5.11.60

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.61
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for markdown parsing regression
  • Upcoming / Past Due Dashboard query updates by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10789
  • v5.11.61 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10797

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.60...v5.11.61
